title: OUTSIDE THE WIRE Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment:
Sorry for the lack of videos lately! My other job repairing bioengineered cyborgs got in the way!

Check out my other sci-fi videos here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7iajBX4Ibg6jaCAH1eIuSgd
I feel like he should've let the nuke hit...for a nice spin on the movie. Thanos style

I really enjoyed it. However, the ending was cliche as usual. The "Humanity can learn to be better" speech is overrated. For once, I want to see the so called "good guys" lose and get the same treatment they've been serving everybody else. If Leo had won by persuading Harp, it would've been a better ending and would've set up an interesting sequel.
Kinda wanted Leo win, Harp woke up too early after being choked out

ending would've had more impact if they showed that Leo was right - in future more 'Leo's' being produced and integrated with the Army, and Harp catching one staring at him one day and thinking 'shit, what have I done......'
description:
In this video we review, recap, explain, and breakdown the ending to Netflix's "Outside the Wire" starring Anthony Mackie and Damson Idris.
